You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesS S] > &star;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Star;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/22c6/index.htm U+022C6].
  * `&star;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2606/index.htm U+02606].
